content: “ The first women deported by the Trump administration, for example, was a mother of two U.S. citizens who had lived in Arizona for two decades and posed no apparent threat to the United States” You would think that sometime within those 20 years she would have found the time to get legal. But just as well; the bitch stole someone’s identity. Speaking as one who has been a victim of that, I say send her home. And she can take her family with her.
